attributes.action: Vince Cable to resign for underselling Royal Mail
attributes.additional_details: Vince Cable has undersold the Royal Mail to the financial institutions. he quoted himself "to judge him on the sale of RM in 3 months time". More than 3 months have past and it is clear that his incompetence has led to the tax payer losing billions of £'s. Therefore he is not fit to hold office and should, in the public interest resign.
